text: The Pokémon Mini (or Pokémon mini) is a handheld game console that was made by Nintendo. It is themed around the Pokémon media franchise. It weighs just under . == Technical details == * CPU 8-bit, 4 MHz Seiko (now Epson) S1C88 * 96 x 64 pixel monochrome LCD * Game Pak (512KiB cartridge) * Internal BIOS of 4kB * Internal ram 4kB (shared with video subsystem) * 21-bit cartridge bus * 256 hardware register; in most cases Open-Bus registers * Dimensions: 74mm x 58mm x 23mm (2.91in x 2.28in x 0.91in) * Weight: with Game Pak and AAA battery inserted * Power: 1 AAA battery (lasting ~60 hours) == List of games == Title Genre Developer Release date Pichu Bros. mini Mini games Denyusha Pokémon Breeder mini Simulation Jupiter Pokémon Party mini Mini games Denyusha Pokémon Pinball mini Pinball Jupiter Pokémon Puzzle Collection Puzzle Jupiter Pokémon Puzzle Collection vol. 2 Puzzle Jupiter Pokémon Race mini Racing Jupiter Pokémon Tetris Puzzle Nintendo Pokémon Zany Cards Strategy Denyusha Togepi's Great Adventure Adventure Jupiter ==References== Category:Pokémon Category:Nintendo hardware
title: Pokémon Mini
